pkgmetadata.longdescription: https://pypi.org/project/knifes/## 包升级1. 修改版本号rm -r dist && python -m build && python -m twine upload dist/*## 项目更新包pip install knifes --index-url https://pypi.python.org/simple -U## 额外需要安装三方包### ase- cryptography- pycrypto### sms- tencentcloud-sdk-python==3.0.600### alarm、auth、decorators、envconfig、misc、results、sms- django
